dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: Oh look! We're on a Pirate Ship! Can I be the captain?

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: Pirates!? I wanna fight pirates! Lemme at ‘em!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: That could be interesting. I read about how pirates have caused troubles in the past. Perhaps we could fight them off and save the sea!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: How do we defeat them most effectively though?

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: We attack them! We surround them!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: Excellent idea! If three of us surround one of them, they will be much weaker. Looks like there are some canons and generators to help us fight them too.

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: I see the captain of the ship! His beard is on fire! He looks like a meanie!

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: I still want to be captain of the ship.

dialogues.name: Ed
dialogues.dialogueText: Stand next to the wheel and you could pretend you are... I guess.

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: Yay! Then I can sail it to outer space!

dialogues.name: Meda
dialogues.dialogueText: Is everybody ready? Let's get to the bow of the ship!

dialogues.name: Jade
dialogues.dialogueText: I’ll race you to the front of the ship!

dialogues.name: Hally
dialogues.dialogueText: ...and make a lot of alien friends...

dialogues.name: Kent
dialogues.dialogueText: Heh, this is silly. But I guess it could be fun. Let’s GO!
